gyurix.spigotutils

Class CuboidArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • gyurix.spigotutils.CuboidArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigSerialization.StringSerializable, java.lang.Cloneable 

    public class CuboidArea
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigSerialization.StringSerializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Class representing a CuboidArea, with a first and second block location and with or without world parameter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      BlockLocation pos1
      The first position of this CuboidArea, containing the minX, minY and minZ coordinates
      BlockLocation pos2
      The second position of this CuboidArea, containing the maxX, maxY and maxZ coordinates
      java.lang.String world
      The world of this CuboidArea, might be null, if it's not defined

    • Constructor Summary

        public CuboidArea(java.lang.String in)
        Constructs a new CuboidArea from the given String
        Parameters:
        in - - The String from which the CuboidArea should be constructed Accepted input String formats: world minX minY minZ maxX maxY maxZ world minX minY minZ maxX maxY maxZ

      • CuboidArea

        public CuboidArea(Selection sel,
                  boolean saveWorld)
        Construct a new CuboidArea from a WorldEdit selection
        Parameters:
        sel - - The WorldEdit selection
        saveWorld - - True if not only the min, and max points, but also the World should be saved
